Articles.Content:
Hi everyone! I just made a new youtube channel with tutorial videos. As of now, I'm uploading a spaceplane tutorial and uploaded an orbiting tutorial. I would really appreciate help. I need to know where to get good music from, what editing program should I use (I'm using Windows Live Movie Maker, I need a better one) and tips like what can I do with my vids on youtube. if you are just starting out, take a look at my channel and give some feedback

Wish you success!
